versos: (looketh) Psalm 33:13 - The LORD looketh from heaven; he beholdeth all the sons of men.;;
(liberty) Galatians 5:1 - "It is for freedom that Christ has set us free. Stand firm, then, and do not let yourselves be burdened again by a yoke of slavery.";;;
(shut) Isaiah 26:20 - "Go, my people, enter your rooms and shut the doors behind you; hide yourselves for a little while until his wrath has passed by.";;;
(free) Galatians 5:1 - "It is for freedom that Christ has set us free. Stand firm, then, and do not let yourselves be burdened again by a yoke of slavery.";;;
(error) Psalm 119:110 - "The wicked have laid a snare for me, but I do not stray from your precepts.";;;
(oracle) Isaiah 30:10: "They say to the seers, 'See no more visions' and to the prophets, 'Give us no more visions of what is right Tell us pleasant things, prophesy illusions.'";;;
(egyptian) Genesis 12:11 - And when he was about to enter Egypt, he said to Sar'ai his wife, "I know that you are a woman beautiful to behold.";;;
(skin) Job 19:26-27: "And after my skin has been destroyed, yet in my flesh I will see God; I myself will see him with my own eyesI, and not another. How my heart yearns within me";;;
(embrace) Song of Solomon 2:6 - His left hand is under my head
(tied) Genesis 44:30 - "Now, therefore, when I come to your servant my father, and the boy is not with us, then, as his life is bound up in the boy's life,";;;

(reigneth) Revelation 19:6 - "And I heard as it were the voice of a great multitude, and as the voice of many waters, and as the voice of mighty thunderings, saying, Alleluia: for the Lord God omnipotent reigneth.";;;

(exact) Hebrews 8:5 - They serve at a sanctuary that is a copy and shadow of what is in heaven. This is why Moses was warned when he was about to build the tabernacle: "See to it that you make everything according to the pattern shown you on the mountain.";;;
(suppose) Luke 24:37 "They were startled and frightened, thinking they saw a ghost.";;;
(bondage) Galatians 5:1 - "Stand fast therefore in the liberty by which Christ has made us free, and do not be entangled again with a yoke of bondage.";;;

(turning) Ezekiel 18:30 - "Therefore, I will judge you, O house of Israel, each one according to his ways, declares the Lord GOD. Repent and turn from all your transgressions, so they will not be a stumbling block of iniquity for you.";;;
(images) Exodus 20:4 - "You shall not make for yourself an image in the form of anything in heaven above or on the earth beneath or in the waters below.";;;
